Copyrights and Credits

'Copyrights and Credits _ U.S. Geological Survey.pdf'

Downloaded October 1, 2024, from
https://www.usgs.gov/information-policies-and-instructions/copyrights-and-credits

Note: some minor changes to the source code for compatibility with newer Linux
compilers were make by Wesley Ebisuzaki and these changes are also in the Public Domain.
